ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Difinetely this course is recommended for any advanced Arabic students.

I would recommend it for a fellow student since , as I mentioned above, the course is very helpful to improve our proficiency in classical arabic as well as our understanding in a topic that attracted many attentions of many in Islamic Philospy.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: While my specialization is literature, it was very helpful fo me to immerse myself into Arabic philosophical texts. With this I hope I will be elegeible to compare between different linquistic disclurses within the same tradition.
Having been attended the course, I feel myself eager to write one commentary one the soul for myself. I mean, I enjoyed the course, and I feel myself acquired the knowledge to write one for myself.
